title: Fallujah - Leper Colony (EP)  MP3  320k   ak2009
description:
Fallujah - Leper Colony (EP)  MP3  320k   ak2009 What we got...Fallujah is a US-based technical death metal band from San Francisco , California that was founded in 2007.

Contents

    1 History
    2 style
    
   
History

The band was formed in early 2007 by high school friends founded Alex Hofmann (electric guitar), Scott Carstairs (electric guitar), Tommy Logan (drums), Dan Wissinger (bass) and Suliman Arghandiwal (vocals). Her first appearance kept the group on 15 June 2007. The first demo, which included four songs that appeared towards the end of the month. Later in the year, the band Wissinger and Logan parted. As a replacement bassist Brandon "Brando" Hoberg and drummer Andrew Baird came to the occupation. It was followed by other appearances in the San Francisco Bay Area , before concerts outside this area were carried out. In the winter of 2007, the group took in the TWS studios in Vacaville on their second demo, which was released in January 2008. Within a year the band wrote new songs, in January 2009 the first EP was followed by the name Leper Colony. Before the recordings, the band of singer Arghandiwal had separated, after Hofmann took over the singing and came as the new guitarist Rob Maramonte to Fallujah. The EP was headed by Sam Pura at the Panda Studios recorded in San Francisco. After the release the band performances held in Chico , Fresno and Bakersfield . In the summer there was a two-week tour with Antagony of Oakland by California, Oregon , Washington , Idaho , Utah , Colorado , New Mexico and Arizona . After the band by bassist and guitarist Hoberg Maramonte separated. As a replacement guitarist Anthony Borges who already at The Scourge of Medusa, Valkyrja, and came Suffokate worked, and Rob Morey, working at The Scourge of Medusa and Rise Of Caligula, to the band. Then, the group went on a month-long tour with Fallen Figure, the tour in December 2009 and January 2010 took place. In spring 2010, the group split again by Borges, whereupon Rob Maramonte returned to the band. Then the band went on a tour of the West Coast of the United States . After that, the band began work on their debut album The Harvest Wombs.  The album was released in 2011 with Unique Leader Records . 
Style

According band biography on uniqueleader.com the group was initially by bands like The Acacia Strain , Converge and Despised Icon affected. In the course of the career, the band have themes such as Satanism is concerned, religious fundamentalism, philosophical ideas, nature and social fallacies.  According Islander nocleansinging.com of the band playing at The Harvest Wombs a mixture of Black Metal and Progressive Melodic Death Metal . The aggressive, fast music remember the Fleshgod Apocalypse album Agony . Breakdowns are as at the end of the song Prison of the Mind rarely.  According to Alexander Quarter of metalnews.de play the band on the album, technical death metal comparable to the music of Decrepit Birth , with the vocals on Fallujah is more versatile, however. In addition, parallels to be The Faceless , Cynic and Obscura determine. In the songs are melodic solos and small jazz influences, as well as ambient sounds and guitar sounds as of Post-Black Metal bands like Wolves in the Throne Room and Altar of Plagues audible. 
.....I wanted some more from these guys so......
